posts.title: Reading the 2019 Awards Season: Emmy Edition
posts.text: After 71 years of watching talented creatives grace the Emmys throne, 2019’s nomination list is more exciting than ever before with multiple productions standing on literary roots.

posts.title: Stranger Books: Reading Recs for the 'Stranger Things' Crew
posts.text: Let’s reflect on Eleven, Will, Mike, and the rest of the kids who stole our hearts and embedded themselves in our pop culture—and suggest some books to match with its characters.
